Key Match Events: Luiz Henrique scored the 89th-minute goal that gave Brazil a 2-1 away win over Chile in a World Cup qualifying match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed for 30 minutes due to a wet pitch at Monumental Stadium in the Venezuelan city of Maturin
Others: Brazil will finish the ninth round of the round-robin South American competition in fourth place
Argentina, which leads the 10-team competition, now has 19 points after nine matches
